Plot: Convinced that a CCN cameraman is her true love, an eccentric crossword puzzler trails him as he travels all over the country, hoping to convince him that they belong together.
Title: All About Steve
Actors: Sandra Bullock, Thomas Haden Church, Bradley Cooper, Ken Jeong
tomatoConsensus: All About Steve is an oddly creepy, sour film, featuring a heroine so desperate and peculiar that audiences may be more likely to pity than root for her.
